column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////service was good--I ordered the chicken noodle bowl
column2: was luke warm and half the noodles it should have had--I ordered their free garlic and asked for it to be crushed
column3: 5 stars for that--my son ordered the rice chicken bowl
column4: and again luke warm--for spending $40 dollars and we all had water and no extras
column6: and not wait when there are empty tables--its not just the food
